casebody.data:
Curtis L. SANGSTER
v.
The Honorable Paul L. JONES, Senior Resident Judge of Greene County. No. 152P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Curtis L. Sangster, Pro Se. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 27th day of March 2007 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Greene County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in Conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
